      • getProjectReferenceFilesPage

        @RequestMapping(value="/{projectId}/settings/referenceFiles",
                method=GET)
public String getProjectReferenceFilesPage​(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                           Principal principal,
                                           @PathVariable
                                           long projectId)
        Get the reference files page for a project
        Parameters:
        model - model for the view
        principal - currently logged in user
        projectId - id of the project to get files for
        Returns:
        name of the reference files view

@ResponseBody

                                                            Long projectId,
                                                            Locale locale)
        Get the reference files fro a project
        Parameters:
        projectId - the ID of the project
        locale - locale of the logged in user
        Returns:
